section.name: Gemma - open source genomics data metaanalysis
section.p: The navigation at left is focused on the software development process for Gemma, including downloadable source.
If you want to use Gemma for analysis, please head over to the Gemma web interface here .
Gemma is a project of the Pavlidis lab at the University of British Columbia Department of Psychiatry .
